meanings.definition: The world's largest dog show, held annually in the United Kingdom.
meanings.sent1: Many dog lovers eagerly anticipate attending Crufts each year.
meanings.sent2: Winning a prize at Crufts is a dream for many dog owners.
meanings.sent3: At Crufts, even the most pampered pups can feel like celebrities.
meanings.sent4: To dog owners, Crufts is like the Olympics of the canine world.
meanings.sent5: The excitement at Crufts is as palpable as a wagging tail.

meanings.sent1: Competing at Crufts is a great honor for dog breeders.
meanings.sent2: The atmosphere at Crufts is filled with anticipation and excitement.
meanings.sent3: Some say winning at Crufts is like winning the lottery for dog lovers.
meanings.sent4: In the world of dog shows, Crufts shines like a diamond.
meanings.sent5: The prestige of Crufts is unmatched in the dog show world.

meanings.sent1: The Crufts family has a long history in this town.
meanings.sent2: Mr. and Mrs. Crufts are well-known members of the community.
meanings.sent3: The name Crufts always brings a smile to people's faces.
meanings.sent4: In the Crufts household, family values are cherished above all.
meanings.sent5: The legacy of the Crufts name is as solid as a rock.
